channel.title: What Does This Mean, Exactly?
channel.description:
attackNPCSWithin(391, 5 + misc.random(60), 5); :|
EDIT: Dont tell me it means that the spell attacks the NPC within those coords. I Know that.
But like what does each number mean (Exaplme: ###, #, #) What does each mean? Also: How would i edit to only attack people 2 steps away from me?

item.title: What Does This Mean, Exactly?
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I think i don’t the the last i use this

					} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1648 && !plr.ProtMelee){
						npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1833;
						hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(2);

my npc will now hit form 0-2

Read full topic

item.title: What Does This Mean, Exactly?
item.dc:creator: @theyungbubba theyungbubba
item.description:
@theyungbubba wrote:

So the last number would be the steps.?? Right?

and i think the 5 + misc.random(60) means that it will hit for a 5, plus another number between 0->60…?

Read full topic

item.title: What Does This Mean, Exactly?
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I think

attackNPCSWithin(391, 5 + misc.random(60), 3);

391 = the npc id,

5 + misc.random(60); = its hit 5-60 dmg.

Read full topic
